title: The Khekarian Threat
description: THE JSHI MOVE BETWEEN DIMENSIONS. THE TERRANS THINK THEM A MYTH. ALEISHA SEES THEM. STURN WANTS THEM. Their abilities will ensure the overthrow of the Chiddran Empire and secure for the exiled Khekarian prince his return to power. There are harsh penalties should anyone give Sturn less than what he wants. His bodyguard, Sevi, can deliver. Aleisha should not have crossed him, she knows what Sevi can do. Jackie should not have crossed him, she knows what Sevi is. Now it’s Raoul’s turn to take them on - and win - or watch the downfall of the Chiddran, the takeover of Zumaridi, the enslavement of the Jshi and the eventual fall of the Terran Sector. WARNING: This book contains ADULT THEMES and COARSE LANGUAGE.
author: A.D. Everard
